metadata.title: W3Schools.com

metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.code_html:
module mymodule {
}

content.text: The module keyword is used to declare a module. Following the keyword is the name of the module and braces which can contain directives describing the module.
content.html: The module keyword is used to declare a module. Following the keyword is the name of the module and braces which can contain directives describing the module.

content.text: Note: The module keyword is meant to be used in the module-info.java file of a module.
content.html: Note: The module keyword is meant to be used in the module-info.java file of a module.

content.text: The module keyword was new in Java 9.
